comments.body:
I think we have fontconfig  in conda Forge.  Is there a reason you need to yum install it? 

https://github.com/conda-forge/fontconfig-feedstock

Phantomjs from npm still seems to only work with fontconfig and freetype
from yum... issue over on nbpresent-feedstock

> I think we have fontconfig in conda Forge. Is there a reason you need to
> yum install it?

> https://github.com/conda-forge/fontconfig-feedstock
